channel.title: Client issues, need urgent help!
channel.description:
note: some input files use or override a deprecated API note: recompile with -xlint:deprecation for details.
Hello all, Bacially i am using source cammypvp v2.2 with the client issues with it, ive opened client.java and changed what i think needed to be changed where it states the ip adress.
Afterwards u go to compile all the files of the client so i can play on my server, and i have errors connecting to the server which i belive is to do with erros with compiling?
anyway any help would be great as this has been really bugging me. thanks, rjb

item.title: Client issues, need urgent help!
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

It’s not an error, it’s just a developers note.

Read full topic
